createConfigurationBaselineTooltip: Create a configuration baseline to capture the structure and its configuration criteria.
saveConfigurationBaselineTooltip: Save the changes of configuration and filtering criteria to the configuration baseline.
replayConfigurationBaselineTooltip: Replay the saved criteria to update the content of the configuration baseline.
closeConfigurationBaselineTooltip: Setting state of configuration baseline to Close will prevent any modification to the configuration and filtering criteria, and to replay for content update.
